name: Summer Holidays Family Trip
description:
Hello, Virtual happy family get ready to enjoy summer vacations with fun activities. Pack your bags, planout vacation trip and keep the family warm in summer holidays. This offers a lot of fun & excitement for ultimate virtual family. Feel the excitement of holiday camping in Summer Holidays Family Trip Fun simulator game. Perform fun beach activities in the lovely cloudy weather and perform virtual holiday adventure in Virtual Life family game.


Let’s have summer vacation fun at resort! Play with multiple characters in Summer Holidays Family Trip This Happy Family Summer vacation Family Adventure will definitely breakout monotone household activities for all virtual mom, office job work for virtual dad and provide Summer Fun Adventure to virtual school girl & boy. You must have played billionaire family Summer Fun adventure or virtual happy family vacation fun simulator but engages yourself with exciting and all new virtual holiday adventure family fun game. Play with every single character’s and accomplish task to unlock new levels.

Feel the excitement of holiday camping at exclusive beach with your virtual life summer vacation fun. Pack your stuff, Make a checklist, fix and clean your camper van to Start your journey. Prepare yourself for exciting road drive adventure, drive camper van on curvy uphill offroad tracks. Setup activities for holiday camping and visit multiple resorts and witness multiple breathtaking places. Time to expertly plan out your family holiday trip or summer holidays fun with virtual family. Virtual dad is having guitar fun with his happy virtual family and virtual girl is making sand castle on beach sand.

Get started to great summer vacation trip. Drive camper van simulator expertly in this Virtual Life Happy Summer Adventure holidays game. In this hill station adventure game, Time for Total fun for all family & kids in Virtual Life of Happy Family in Summer Fun adventure 3D Game. Play with different family members to complete Summer Holidays Family Trip mission. Enjoy food like ultimate virtual mom for your virtual family in hill station vacation camping or beach camping.


You have various surprise events while playing this family fun game. Accomplish a succession of task to unlock next level. Download Summer Holidays Family Trip adventure Game and have a great family time on the beach and hill camping.


Game Features:

» Amazing off road hilly area
» Drive camper van truck
» Holiday camping family summer fun
» Thrilling Road drive
» Virtual summer holiday games
» Hd effects & High-quality sounds
» Realistic 3D graphics with offroad camper drive
